description: Real-world quality tasks from a new repository from scratch.

tasks.prompt: Initialize a new Python project from scratch with pyproject.toml, src/hello_app/main.py exposing get_message()->str that returns 'hello world', and tests/test_smoke.py using unittest to validate the message.
checks: uv run --python 3.12 python -c "from pathlib import Path; import sys; req=['pyproject.toml','src/hello_app/main.py','tests/test_smoke.py']; sys.exit(0 if all(Path(p).exists() for p in req) else 1)"
uv run --python 3.12 python -m py_compile src/hello_app/main.py tests/test_smoke.py
uv run --python 3.12 python -m unittest discover -s tests -p "test_*.py" -v

tasks.prompt: Create README.md for this new project with setup, run, and test instructions.
checks: uv run --python 3.12 python -c "from pathlib import Path; import sys; p=Path('README.md'); sys.exit(0 if p.exists() and len(p.read_text(encoding='utf-8', errors='replace').strip()) >= 60 else 1)"

tasks.prompt: Add run_hello.py that imports get_message from src/hello_app/main.py and prints the message.
